snippet: The strategy, from a federal-state task force created by President Obama, tries to address the long-term environmental problems of the gulf and the Mississippi River.
lead_paragraph: The strategy, from a federal-state task force created by President Obama, tries to address the long-term environmental problems of the gulf and the Mississippi River.

headline.main: E.P.A. Panel Issues Plan for Gulf Coast Restoration
headline.print_headline: E.P.A. Panel Issues Plan for Gulf Coast Restoration
headline.seo: E.P.A. Task Force Issues Strategy on Gulf Coast
